Text.val: Author: Christian Overhoff
Creates the combobox texts for the actions in OID705.
11.11.2013 GB SCR18429 Extended renge of DLDB with DLDB_DISPLAYINZOOMLIST = Y
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
09.07.2011 GB SCR16577 Removed range DULD_DISPLAYINZOOMLISTCRED = Y
27.02.2011 GB SCR16087 extended condition for selection in the Duld_letter_actions
18.06.2010 AK SCR12084 filter DULD_DISPLAYINZOOMLISTCRED
09.11.2006 AK SCR12084 expand the PO.Combobox_text to A 4000 (it was to short)
09.03.2006 CO SCR 10585 added range for client actions
Get users department code:
Always build the combobox actions with DULD records:
In case of a given action (=call from OID703)
another action has to be added,
if the action has not already been in the list of duld letter actions:
If still no record found, return an "empty" action string:
ATTENTION: Magic Range is used!
Range on blank for ClientAction only (SCR 10585):
Code 220:
Get result string blank:
Delete last Comma (in case there is any):
Add Blank-option at the beginning of the string:
If Code 220 exists (or other rows before existed already) => take it:
(RepStr-function covers problems with commas in the description text!)
If there is an action (=call from OID703),
look if this action is in DULD also
(if not, it has to be added to the combobox-lines later!)
Get translation for the initial value (if any):
Code 220:
Code 131:
First add a comma in the end of the comboboxlines
(if combobox was empty, then add comma after an empty line):
If the action was NOT in DULD, then add another line to the combobox:
Found the action in CODE220:
Found the action in CODE131:
Found action not in CODE220 and not in CODE131: Add the pure code:
